item.description:
Brynn Bishop will lead this Ritual on Friday, Feb12, 7:30-9:30pm.

Be touched by the divine love that exists within each of our hearts as a guiding beacon back to our original unity. Allow the masks to fall away, revealing our true nature. Let us bask in the brilliance of each otherâ€™s light, and allow it to penetrate our separateness.

We come together in community to touch the divine and mirror to each other our own inner radiance. Embracing ourselves and each other as the Beloved, our lives become filled with an immense abundance of love and connection.

Celebrate, rejoice and be nourished by the bountiful care and connection enveloping us in sacred community.

Come alone, with a friend, or a partner.
No prior experience necessary. Beginners welcome!
$20 donation. (no one turned away for lack of funds)
item.name: PUJA: Embracing the Beloved Within
